full_text:
Page 1940
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (BOP) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS)" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Sent: Thu, 25 Jul 2019 17:39:40 +0000
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Thank you very much.

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov]
Sent: Thursday, July 25, 2019 12:23 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (BOP) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Cc: Shirley V. Skipper-Scott (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Assistance with MCC New York

Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

I contacted Associate Warden Skipper-Scott who is cc'd on this email, and she will be able to provide any information that you need. If you need anything else, please let me know.

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
202-598-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Acting SDAD/CPD
Federal Bureau of Prisons
320 1st St. NW, HOLC Bldg. 545
Washington, DC 20534
Office: (202) 598-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov

>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 7/25/2019 11:33 AM >>>
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

There has been an incident with a high profile prisoner (Jeffrey Epstein) at MCC New York. We are trying to get some basic information about the incident and are having a hard time getting any information out of the facility. Is there someone we could speak to and get the basic information? The USM and Chief for our S/New York office are having no luck with the Warden and Assistant Warden.

DOJ-OGR-00025886

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content is related to an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York.
